code: @Override public void writeTo(StreamOutput out) throws IOException {     super.writeTo(out).     out.writeBoolean(detailed).     out.writeBoolean(waitForCompletion). }

comment: /**  * Should the detailed task information be returned.  */
code: /**  * Should the detailed task information be returned.  */ public boolean getDetailed() {     return this.detailed. }

comment: /**  * Should the detailed task information be returned.  */
code: /**  * Should the detailed task information be returned.  */ public ListTasksRequest setDetailed(boolean detailed) {     this.detailed = detailed.     return this. }

comment: /**  * Should this request wait for all found tasks to complete?  */
code: /**  * Should this request wait for all found tasks to complete?  */ public boolean getWaitForCompletion() {     return waitForCompletion. }

comment: /**  * Should this request wait for all found tasks to complete?  */
code: /**  * Should this request wait for all found tasks to complete?  */ public ListTasksRequest setWaitForCompletion(boolean waitForCompletion) {     this.waitForCompletion = waitForCompletion.     return this. }
